CustomField.formula: IF ( AND(LEN( Apttus_QPConfig__PriceListId__c ) > 0, CONTAINS(Quote_Type__c, 'CPQ') ) , HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_Lightning_Page_Redirect?id=" &Id & "&flow=" & IF(Quote_Type__c == 'Direct CPQ', 'DirectFlow&cntrNbr_1=' & Direct_Price_List_Number__c, 'IndirectFlow&cntrNbr_1=' & Project_Price_List_Number__c), IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom", "Configure Products/Pricing"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Configure Products (Turbo)
